deadism.mechanics.fatigue.description: Affects your Productivity based on your Actions.
deadism.mechanics.infection.description: Concentration of the Zombie Virus in your Blood.
deadism.traps.rope.description: Mechanically Join Two Components or Make a TripWire
deadism.traps.turrets.description: Shoots at Hostiles within a Range.
deadism.traps.bear_trap.description: Repurposed Metal Jaws that Clamp on Zombies (and Players Alike).
deadism.traps.motor_blade.description: Cuts the Zombies from the Waist Down.
deadism.weapons.chainsaw.description: Cut Trees or Cut Through a Horde, Two in One.
deadism.weapons.flame_thrower.descriptio: This Thing will keep you Safe, and Hot.
deadism.weapons.landmine.description: Step on it for a Blast.
